com.cognifide.slice.mapper.annotation

Annotation Type JcrProperty


  • @Documented
@Target(value=FIELD)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface JcrProperty
    Allows mapper a resource stored under given jcr property. The path to a resource is the one indicated by the name of the field or JcrProperty. Field with this annotation will be mapped by Mapper using dedicated MappingStrategy. By default MappingStrategy.ANNOTATED strategy is used. 
     @SliceResource
 public class ExampleModel {

   @JcrProperty
   private String pagePath;
 
   @JcrProperty("description")
   private String pageDescription;
 }

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String value
      Custom property name.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract String value
        Custom property name. If empty, property name is read from field's name.
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""
